# Devolmino

This is a [Fillomino](https://puzz.link/rules.html?fillomino) variant - when a number is placed in a solid circle, the dashed circle in the same place one grid to the right must have that number minus one placed in it.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2023/devolmino1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
